title: CARGO / NIGHT WATCHMAN BOOTH
description: René's booth dialogue shall be in here

dialogueTree.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "This is the nightwatchman's booth...."
dialogueTree.text: This is the nightwatchman's booth. The name on the door reads *René Arnoux*. René left his uniform neatly folded on the table.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Take it. It's just there. Who cares..."
links.text: Take it. It's just there. Who cares? It's not like anyone's gonna need it.

links.title: Authority: "Generally speaking, it would be *di..."
links.text: Generally speaking, it would be *dishonourable* to take it. But then... it looks like a military uniform! And wearing that is very honourable. So, a conflict of honour. It's up to you.

dialogueTree.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "This is the nightwatchman's booth...."
dialogueTree.text: This is the nightwatchman's booth. The name on the door reads *René Arnoux*.

links.title: Volition: "Listen... It's okay to take a few m..."
links.text: Listen... It's okay to take a few minutes to yourself. Sit down and have a breather.

links.title: Endurance: "You need to rest. Your body is achi..."
links.text: You need to rest. Your body is aching. Getting in here has taken something out of you. Have a seat.

links.title: You: ""Kim, I'm gonna take a quick look i..."
links.text: "Kim, I'm gonna take a quick look inside." (Search the booth.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you must." The lieutenant looks..."
links.text: "If you must." The lieutenant looks around. "But please hurry -- we're pretty easy to spot up here."

links.title: You: ""So this is where René works. I'm g..."
links.text: "So this is where René works. I'm gonna look around." (Search the booth.)

links.title: You: "Maybe René is hiding something inte..."
links.text: Maybe René is hiding something interesting here. (Search the booth.)

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "Nothing incriminating catches your..."
links.text: Nothing incriminating catches your eye. The cabinets are clean and their sparse contents meticulously organized. There's a framed photograph on the table.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "Nothing incriminating catches your..."
links.text: Nothing incriminating catches your eye. The cabinets are clean and their sparse contents meticulously organized. Apart from the uniform, the only noteworthy item is a framed photograph on the table.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "Nothing incriminating catches your..."
links.text: Nothing incriminating catches your eye. The cabinets are clean and their sparse contents meticulously organized. There's a framed photograph on the table.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Looks like the inhabitant was rathe..."
links.text: Looks like the inhabitant was rather pedantic when it came to order.

links.title: You: "Take the picture."
links.text: Take the picture.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "It's a black and white photo of a y..."
links.text: It's a black and white photo of a young couple out in a street fair. The man -- René -- is dressed in a Royal Carabineer uniform. The girl is young and very pretty. She is smiling playfully at the camera.

links.title: Empathy: "René looks like he's about to smile..."
links.text: René looks like he's about to smile. This photo must be tied to some good memories.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why did you take that?" the lieute..."
links.text: "Why did you take that?" the lieutenant asks, glancing at the photo.

links.title: You: ""It's something to remember him by.""
links.text: "It's something to remember him by."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You really took an interest in tha..."
links.text: "You really took an interest in that old soldier." The lieutenant sounds surprised. "I guess there's no harm taking the picture. The dockworkers would probably throw it in the trash anyway."

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna ask him about it.""
links.text: "I'm gonna ask him about it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're *really* interested in that..."
links.text: "You're *really* interested in that old soldier," he remarks, surprised. "Not sure I understand your fascination, but sure -- as long as it doesn't take up a whole lot of time."

links.title: You: ""*Something* about this man peaks m..."
links.text: "*Something* about this man peaks my interest. I think this can be a side-thing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine." He nods. "But let's move. I..."
links.text: "Fine." He nods. "But let's move. I don't want to be seen snooping around here."

links.title: You: ""I'm a cop. It's instinctual to col..."
links.text: "I'm a cop. It's instinctual to collect evidence."

links.title: You: ""I'm making an artistic photo colla..."
links.text: "I'm making an artistic photo collage, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course you are," he says matter..."
links.text: "Of course you are," he says matter-of-factly. "What murder investigation would be complete without an arbitrary photo collage."

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "It's a black and white photo of a y..."
links.text: It's a black and white photo of a young couple out in a street fair. The man is young, dark-skinned, and dressed in a Royal Carabineer uniform. The girl is smiling playfully at the camera.

links.title: Empathy: "The young man looks happy as well...."
links.text: The young man looks happy as well. He's about to smile, right after this moment frozen in time. You're sure of that.

links.title: You: "Leave the picture alone."
links.text: Leave the picture alone.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's get going," the lieutenant s..."
links.text: "Let's get going," the lieutenant says impatiently. "The entire neighbourhood can see us up here."

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "The photo remains neatly placed on..."
links.text: The photo remains neatly placed on the edge of the table.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Looks like the inhabitant is rather..."
links.text: Looks like the inhabitant is rather pedantic when it comes to order.

links.title: You: "Let's see what the nightwatchman ke..."
links.text: Let's see what the nightwatchman keeps in here. (Search the booth.)

links.title: You: "Have a seat. Rest."
links.text: Have a seat. Rest.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "The chair is not as austere as the..."
links.text: The chair is not as austere as the rest of the booth. A thin grey pillow is attached to the seat, secured to the stiles by black ribbons.

links.title: You: "Breathe deep."
links.text: Breathe deep.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "Stale air floods through your nostr..."
links.text: Stale air floods through your nostrils. Not a single mote of dust floats inside your lungs, though. The inside of the booth is immaculate.

links.title: You: "Search for a little something-somet..."
links.text: Search for a little something-something to help you out.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "The drawers are empty save for old..."
links.text: The drawers are empty save for old time sheets and receipts. One small box, however, does hold some cheap painkillers. They are slightly out of date.

links.title: You: ""Kim, would you mind if I helped my..."
links.text: "Kim, would you mind if I helped myself to some meds?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant shrugs. "I'm not her..."
links.text: The lieutenant shrugs. "I'm not here to tell you what to do, detective."

links.title: You: "Take the painkillers."
links.text: Take the painkillers.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "You take the painkillers. They are..."
links.text: You take the painkillers. They are yours now.

links.title: You: "Read the side-effects."
links.text: Read the side-effects.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "Oh boy, where to start. Elevated ri..."
links.text: Oh boy, where to start. Elevated risk of dementia? Mini-strokes? Prophet's disease? Sudden death? Hair death? Erectile malfunction? Critical flatulence? Watery blood? Black mucous? Uncontrollable weeping? Increased sensitivity to l'Opéra? Inoperable joint disorder? Total spinal collapse?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Don't think about that! Quick, thin..."
links.text: Don't think about that! Quick, think about something else!

links.title: You: "I'm a cop. I have cop things to do...."
links.text: I'm a cop. I have cop things to do. Murders to solve. People to help. Kim's counting on me.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "The enormity of the case before you..."
links.text: The enormity of the case before you dwarfs the list of side-effects. You can't even see the side-effects anymore. They're nothing to you.

links.title: You: "Disco. Mirror balls. Kick-ass moves..."
links.text: Disco. Mirror balls. Kick-ass moves. Boogie beat.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "The imagined dazzle of light overwh..."
links.text: The imagined dazzle of light overwhelms any list of potential side-effects. Any negative thoughts are drowned out by the fantastic blast of *disco*.

links.title: You: "... oh my God, I went up to a woman..."
links.text: ... oh my God, I went up to a woman and actually said *I want to have fuck with you* earlier. What the hell is wrong with me?

links.title: You: "I hope I'm not fucking René over by..."
links.text: I hope I'm not fucking René over by taking his painkillers.

links.title: You: "I don't see what the big deal is. T..."
links.text: I don't see what the big deal is. This sounds pretty normal to me.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "Your nihilistic humour renders the..."
links.text: Your nihilistic humour renders the list of side-effects null and void. Just like everything else in this empty world.

links.title: You: "That's kind of sad, actually..."
links.text: That's kind of sad, actually...

links.title: You: "Moving along!"
links.text: Moving along!

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "Yes. Moving along."
links.text: Yes. Moving along.

links.title: You: "I am scared I will never be held or..."
links.text: I am scared I will never be held or loved in this world again.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "Maybe this was a bad idea..."
links.text: Maybe this was a bad idea...

links.title: You: "Get up."
links.text: Get up.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "You stand and exit the booth."
links.text: You stand and exit the booth.

links.title: You: "Get up."
links.text: Get up.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "You stand and exit the booth."
links.text: You stand and exit the booth.

links.title: You: "Take the uniform."
links.text: Take the uniform.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suppose René is not going to be..."
links.text: "I suppose René is not going to be needing it anymore." He studies the uniform. "It's a bit too colourful for my taste, though."

links.title: You: ""It's, uhm, needed for work and all..."
links.text: "It's, uhm, needed for work and all that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fantastic. Try not to wear it with..."
links.text: "Fantastic. Try not to wear it with other similarly colourful clothes, okay?"

links.title: You: ""This is gonna take my shit to the..."
links.text: "This is gonna take my shit to the next level."

links.title: You: ""I'm done here.""
links.text: "I'm done here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know about stealing people..."
links.text: "I don't know about stealing people's *very colourful* clothes like that..." He looks on disapprovingly.

links.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "As you take the colourful uniform,..."
links.text: As you take the colourful uniform, a few cookie crumbs fall to the floor. The owner must have a sweet tooth.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "This is the nightwatchman's booth...."
dialogueTree.text: This is the nightwatchman's booth. The name on the door reads *René Arnoux*. A colourful uniform lies neatly folded on the table.

dialogueTree.title: Nightwatchman's Booth: "This is the nightwatchman's booth...."
dialogueTree.text: This is the nightwatchman's booth. The name on the door reads *René Arnoux*.
